snippet.title: SunnySide Devstream Highlights #10 | Our Game Demo Premier
snippet.description:
🔸Pre-order SunnySide:
https://sunnyside.backerkit.com/hosted_preorders

🔸Check out @DoctorDDub's video about SunnySide:
https://youtu.be/HhA9AV7ujJQ

Communities:
🔸 LinkinBio: https://lnk.bio/RainyGamesUK

🔸 Discord: https://invite.gg/SunnySide​​​​
🔸 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/rainygamesuk
🔸 Twitter: https://twitter.com/RainyGamesUK
🔸 Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/rainygamesuk

00:00 - Welcome!
00:42 - Hair Breaks Games
01:19 - Follow the Socials! Please?
01:59 - Building SunnySide's Stories
03:29 - Let's Press Start!
03:42 - Character Creation
04:27 - Mixing Hair Colors
05:47 - Playing Dress Up
06:23 - Game Time!
07:26 - Let's Dig!
07:54 - A Chat: How Narrative Impacts Game Development (And vice versa)
08:38 - Purchasing Seeds
10:49 - The Build Drone
14:43 - A Chat: Talking about Time
17:45 - Planting Veggies
19:12 - Let's go to town!
19:58 - Let's sell Gabe some rocks...
22:03 - Rainy, what's a Cupule?
22:42 - Hiro the Tech Hero
23:36 - Sako closes early. 
25:01 - A Chat: Answering Questions
26:00 - SunnySide at Night
27:11 - Day 3 is for Mining (and more questions)
29: 25 - A Chat: Talkin' Romance Options
33:57 - Rainy's a cheater 
36:02 - A Chat: Talkin' Representation
37:45 - Day 4 is for chickens
39:38 - A Chat: Who is Blake?
40:12 - Shopping with Gabe and Sako
42:40 - Day 5 is for Natural Resources
46:40 - Day 6 is for Grilling
51:36 - A SunnySide Tour
53:00 - Introducing Lucy!!
54:23 - What is Nuclino?
54:54 - Introducing Sebastian!!!
56:14 - Rainy's computer dies.
